name: Sokomarket
tag_list: global-trade, sell-and-buy, import-export, sell-offers, buy-offers, inquiries-quotations, b2b-b2c
overview:
Sokomarket.com encourages and enables interaction, collaboration and networking among manufacturers, suppliers, retailersâ€™ buyers and sellers.This social site offers different levels of trading. For example, small time sellers can easily list individual products to be purchased right from their websites. On the other hand, any business that deals with bulk sales is likewise accounted for. Each and every listing comes with detailed product information and pictures for display to potential buyers. It is always possible to send inquiries and receive quotations from other users, while functionalities like the provided real-time chat interface make for enhanced communication.

All in all, the site makes it possible for traders to conduct businesses in a context where common humanity (and not merely making a profit) is the driving force all along.
